description:
Chuubou reveals her shocking true identity before joining Koukin and Hakufu on a mission to rescue Ryomou!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Commencer par attaquer ce à quoi l`ennemi tient
Greife als Erstes das an, was dem Feind teuer ist
Mazu Sono Ai Suru Tokoro o Ubau
Start by Taking Away the Ones They Love
先ずその愛する所を奪う
